patterns: tell me about scholarship details
responses: IUB provides financial assistance through Merit Scholarships, Financial Aid, and Tuition Fee Discounts, allowing students to receive only one type at a time, selecting the higher value. Merit Scholarships offer tuition waivers of 30% to 100% based on test results and academic performance. Financial Aid includes need-based support and assistance for the children of Freedom Fighters. Tuition Fee Discounts apply to various categories, such as extra-curricular activities and economically disadvantaged students, with waivers up to 100%. Students must maintain a minimum CGPA and credit hours to remain eligible. Required documentation includes financial statements and academic transcripts. For specifics, students should consult the official IUB guidelines.
